name: FlagstoneChurch
0:
”Alexa, open Flagstone Church”
”Alexa, ask Flagstone Church for the latest talk”
”Alexa, start Flagstone Church”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flagstone church
des: Here the latest sermon from Flagstone Church of Christ in Bentonville, Arkansas. You can pause and play by saying "Alexa, pause" and "Alexa, resume." Just say "Alexa, stop" when you're done for the day. When listening to podcasts you can say "Alexa, shuffle" to shuffle the playing order, or "Alexa, loop" to loop the current episode. You can also ask for previous and next episodes by saying "Alexa, previous" and "Alexa, next". Contact Jason Moseley if you have any questions.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
